REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f8999 reute r f BC-MGM/UA-<MGM>-JOINS-CH 03-18 0084

TEXT.TITLE: MGM/UA <MGM> JOINS CHINA FILM CORP PACT
TEXT.BODY: MGM/UA Communications Co said it has joined Paramount Pictures and MCA Inc's <MCA> Universal Studios in their agreement with China Film Corp of Beijing to distribute motion pictures in China. MGM said it is also joining a venture to license two hours a week of primetime television programming to China's national television network. Revenues will be derived from advertising time for U.S. and foreign companies, it said. Reuter
